_header: Like as the Bible maketh mention
Subjects: Augustine of Canterbury, saint; miracles; envoys
_description: John Lydgate, ‘Legend of St. Austin at Compton’ — fifty-one 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc), including envoy

CULHh412.First Lines:
Like as the bybyll makyth mencyounThe originall grownd of deuote
                    offeryng…
CULHh412.Last Lines:
…By cause I am of wittys dulle and oldDo ȝowr deuour thys
                    processe to correct
CULHh412.Editions:
Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard,
                        ed.  
             A Selection from the Minor Poems of Don John Lydgate.
Percy Society
         2. London: T. Richard, 1840: 135-49.

BLHar2255.First Lines:
Lyk as the Bible makith menciounThe Original ground of devout
                    offryng…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…by cause I am of wittis dul and oldDoth your deveer this
                    processe to corecte
BLHar2255.Editions:
Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard,
                        ed.  
             A Selection from the Minor Poems of Don John Lydgate.
Percy Society
         2. London: T. Richard, 1840: 135-49.
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
EETS
         e.s. 107 (1911; repr. 1961): 193-206.
Whatley,  Gordon E.,
                        ed.  
             Saints’ Lives in Middle English Collections.
         With Anne B. Thompson and Robert K. Upchurch. MI: Western Michigan
            University for TEAMS, 2004.

BLHar4826.First Lines:
Lyke as the byble makith menciounthe Original ground of devout
                    offryng…
BLHar4826.Last Lines:
…Be cause I am of wittys dul and OldDoth yowr deveer this
                    processe to Correcte
BLHar4826.Attributed Title:
here be gynneth a myracle doon in seynt Austeyn is tyme (f. 46, rubricated
                    incipit)

BLLan699.First Lines:
LYk as the bible makith mencionThe origynall ground of devout
                    offryng…
BLLan699.Last Lines:
…Bi cause I am of wittis dull & oldDoth your deveer this
                    processe to correcte
BLLan699.Note: Folio number reflects the most recent foliation.
BLLan699.Attributed Title:
Incipit miraculum sancti augustini de decis (f. 34v);
                        Explicit miraculum sancti augustini (f. 41)

Lincoln129.First Lines:
Thus he began bi grace of goddis hondWher god list werce may be
                    noon obstacle…
Lincoln129.Last Lines:
…bi cause I am of wittis dul & olddoth your deveer this
                    processe to correcte
Lincoln129.Note: Lines 1-128 wanting: two folios cut out.
Lincoln129.Attributed Title:
Incipit miraculum sancti Augustini de decis (f. 74v);
                        Explicit miraculum sancti Augustini (f. 79)
